t: For the choir director: with stringed instruments. A Maskil of David. When the Ziphites went and said to Saul, “Is David not hiding among us?”
God,*pn save me by your name, and*ln vindicate me by your might!
God,*ln hear my prayer; listen*ln to the words from my mouth.
For*ln strangers rise up against me, and*ln violent men intend to kill me. They*ln do not let God guide them. Selah*ig
God*pn is my helper; the*ln Lord is the sustainer of my life.
He*ln will repay my adversaries for their evil. Because*ln of your faithfulness, annihilate them.
I*pn will sacrifice a freewill offering to you. I*ln will praise your name, Lord,*s because*ln it is good.
For*ln he has rescued me from every trouble, and*ln my eye has looked down on my enemies.
